predicate.note: Frames file for 'accept' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus.

roleset.name: take willingly

example.name: transitive agentive
example.text: ...prevent them from *trace* accepting our superior cash offer.

example.name: with donor
example.text: He wouldn't accept anything of value from those he was writing about.

roleset.note: Treebank got the syntax here wrong. "Anything" and "of value" are split across two nodes--a complex argument will be necessary.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: ...many practices historically accepted *trace* as normal here...
